label: AB_cF8_216_a_c-001
title: Zincblende (ZnAs, $B3$) Structure
comments:
This is the cubic analog of \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_hP4_186_b_b-001}{wurtzite ($B4$)}, {\em i.e.} the stacking of the ZnS dimers along the $<111>$ direction is ABCABC ... This is also a two-component analog of \href{current_web_home_dir/A_cF8_227_a-001}{diamond ($A4$)}, without the inversion symmetry in the middle of the bond. 
 Zincblende may also be referred to as sphalerite.
